thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 13 of 1699
thread.title: first-time FlightHub customer
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by first-time FlightHub customer

author: first-time FlightHub customer
title: first-time FlightHub customer
text: The nice thing about FlightHub is that you can compare prices between and within companies, and can view the itineraries of each flight option. Further, FlightHub's toll-free number provided me with quick and hassle-free service when I wanted to remove the insurance from my flight, refunding the amount within minutes. Thanks, FlightHub, for your fine service.
